server:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="29" height="29">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="grad_server_ember" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#b4a582;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#9d8b6a;stop-opacity:0.85" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="3" y="4" width="18" height="4" rx="1" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_server_ember)" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <rect x="3" y="10" width="18" height="4" rx="1" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_server_ember)" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <rect x="3" y="16" width="18" height="4" rx="1" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_server_ember)" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <circle cx="6" cy="6" r="0.8" fill="url(#grad_server_ember)"/>
  <circle cx="6" cy="12" r="0.8" fill="url(#grad_server_ember)"/>
  <circle cx="6" cy="18" r="0.8" fill="url(#grad_server_ember)"/>
  <line x1="9" y1="6" x2="18" y2="6" stroke="url(#grad_server_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.5"/>
  <line x1="9" y1="12" x2="18" y2="12" stroke="url(#grad_server_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.5"/>
  <line x1="9" y1="18" x2="18" y2="18" stroke="url(#grad_server_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.5"/>
</svg>
router:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="29" height="29">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="grad_router_ember" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#b4a582;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#9d8b6a;stop-opacity:0.85" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- Router box -->
  <rect x="4" y="14" width="16" height="7" rx="1.5" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <!-- Antennas -->
  <line x1="7" y1="14" x2="7" y2="8" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <line x1="17" y1="14" x2="17" y2="8" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <!-- WiFi waves left -->
  <path d="M 5 11 Q 3 9 3 7" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.6"/>
  <path d="M 4 10 Q 2.5 8.5 2.5 7" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.2000000000000002" opacity="0.4"/>
  <!-- WiFi waves right -->
  <path d="M 19 11 Q 21 9 21 7" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.6"/>
  <path d="M 20 10 Q 21.5 8.5 21.5 7" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_router_ember)" stroke-width="1.2000000000000002" opacity="0.4"/>
  <!-- LED indicators -->
  <circle cx="8" cy="17.5" r="0.7" fill="url(#grad_router_ember)" opacity="0.8"/>
  <circle cx="11" cy="17.5" r="0.7" fill="url(#grad_router_ember)" opacity="0.6"/>
  <circle cx="14" cy="17.5" r="0.7" fill="url(#grad_router_ember)" opacity="0.4"/>
</svg>
access-point:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="29" height="29">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="grad_ap_ember" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#b4a582;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#9d8b6a;stop-opacity:0.85" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <!-- AP disk -->
  <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="7" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_ap_ember)" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="1.2" fill="url(#grad_ap_ember)"/>
  <!-- WiFi waves concentric -->
  <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="4" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_ap_ember)" stroke-width="1.2000000000000002" opacity="0.7"/>
  <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="5.5" fill="none" stroke="url(#grad_ap_ember)" stroke-width="1.2000000000000002" opacity="0.5"/>
  <!-- Mounting bracket -->
  <line x1="12" y1="19" x2="12" y2="21" stroke="url(#grad_ap_ember)" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  <line x1="10" y1="21" x2="14" y2="21" stroke="url(#grad_ap_ember)" stroke-width="1.7999999999999998" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</svg>
